resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108223</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108223</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">MarsQuest Online</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">MarsQuest Online</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">MarsQuest En ligne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">MarsQuest Em linha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">MarsQuest In linea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">MarsQuest on-line</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">MarsQuest En línea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">invites students to launch a spacecraft to Mars, pilot a flyover, explore the Red Planet's canyons and volcanoes, drive a Mars Rover, and see the latest photos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lädt Kursteilnehmer ein, ein Raumfahrzeug zu Mars
auszustoßen, eine Überführung zu steuern, des roten die Schluchten 
und die Vulkane Planeten zu erforschen, einen Mars Vagabunden 
anzutreiben, und die neuesten Fotos zu sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">invite des étudiants à lancer un vaisseau 
spatial à Mars, à piloter un survol, à explorer les gorges et les 
volcans de la planète rouge, à piloter un vagabond de Mars, et à 
voir les dernières photos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">convida estudantes lançar uma nave espacial a 
Marte, pilotar um flyover, explorar as gargantas e vulcões do planeta
vermelho, dirigir um vagabundo de Marte, e ver as fotos as mais 
atrasadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invita gli allievi a lanciare una nave spaziale a 
Marte, a pilotare un flyover, ad esplorare i canyon ed i vulcani del 
pianeta rosso, a guidare un vagabondo del Marte ed a vedere le ultime 
foto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσκαλεί τους σπουδαστές για να προωθήσει ένα 
διαστημικό σκάφος στον Αρη, πειραματικό ένα flyover, να 
εξερευνήσει τα φαράγγια και τα ηφαίστεια του κόκκινου πλανήτη, να
οδηγήσει έναν πλάνη του Αρη, και να δει τις πιό 
πρόσφατες φωτογραφίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invita a estudiantes que lancen una nave espacial 
a Marte, piloten un flyover, exploren las barrancas y los volcanes del
planeta rojo, conduzcan un rover de Marte, y vean las fotos más 
últimas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108223</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/marsquest-online</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
